website_summaries.verdict: Eye-catching copper finish makes this an attractive option.
pros: Made out of heavy aluminum with their patented "Ticerama" coating
Combines the durability of titanium with the quick release of ceramic
cons: Some users noted warping, but preheating the pan with the oven seems to prevent this

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We made brownies. You can see every knife mark where my grandson cut the brownies and some scrape Mark's from the spatula he served them with. Not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Karen Goll

customer_reviews.title: Even heat, no stick and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Heavy aluminum coated with the Ti-Ceramic surface on cooking surface, including inner sides. Have used 5 times thus far for fish sticks, chicken fingers, Brussel sprouts and cookies. Nothing has stuck and clean-ups have been effortless. Much heavier than cheaper cookie sheets (won't warp - hopefully) and heat distribution appears very even so far. Will keep cooking and update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Love Gotham Steel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan to make banana bread since I’m attempting for healthy alternatives to snack on. When I made bread in my original tin that I have had for years, it required a massive amount of non-stick spray to get the loaf to come out so I wanted to try this brand. I was hesitant to put a very sticky batter in a pan with no spray but figured the worse thing, I would have to make a new loaf. When the bread was cooled, I flipped the pan over a plate and the loaf slid right out! There was minimal to no residue on the pan after I dumped it out and made for super easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: I love this Cookie Sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love this Cookie Sheet!!!. It's everything they advertise!! My husband a chef and does unthinkable things to the cooking sheets but with this everything just wipes off. I will buy this again, it's worth the extra money to have this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price point on this is amazing! I love the quality for such an affordable ...
customer_reviews.text: The price point on this is amazing! I love the quality for such an affordable price. Only bad thing I have to say would be that it does tend to bow when in the oven longer than like 15 minutes at 450 degrees; I just remember reading that it wasn't supposed to do this up to that temp so wanted to point that out. My favorite thing about this pan though is the fact that it makes left overs from restaurants taste straight off the line all over again! Even foods that tend to get soggy like quesadillas and fries come out fresh again. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baking Sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further for a baking sheet.. this one is great! I was thrilled when I saw that Gotham was coming out with bakeware... I have the pots and pans(which are wonderful) so I had to get the bakeware as well!!! I have used them daily since December and they still look new!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy solid feeling cookie sheets, but non stick is short lived
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy solid feeling cookie sheets. Hope the surface can be easily maintained, haven't used much yet except for some mess things that I chose to line the pans with foil to keep clean up simple. Update: Although I’ve not used them a lot I’m disappointed that non-stick surface doesn’t clean up easily or well. They are often used with silicon cooking sheet liners, yet they have areas that are accumulating brown baked on spots that can’t be scrubbed off. Surprised & disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: angelluv

customer_reviews.title: like <get the return form from your e-mail>
customer_reviews.text: After the first use ( I rendered bacon) both pans showed damage of the protective coating, granted they were small, but after the first use? Called Gotham and was told to send it back to Amazon, where I bought it. Unfortunately I did not retain the return form and the instructions to do so are unclear, like <get the return form from your e-mail>. Could not find it and so I am stuck with two sheet pans, not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Gunter Schnoerzinger

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay flat in the oven
customer_reviews.text: Immediately when put into the oven, two of the sides popped up so it would not sit flat. This makes it extremely difficult to have an even cooking surface when all the liquid flows to one part of the pan. The non-stick part is fantastic though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this baking tin! It cooks evenly, cleans so NICELY, and is truly non-stick. This is my new go-to for baking small cobblers, cornbread, and even small meat dishes. I have used plastic and metal utensils to remove food from this tin without any scratching or marring. (As a rule, I NEVER recommend using metal on non-stick, but sometimes it is my reality...) I would not hesitate to purchase this item again! Well worth the very reasonable cost!
customer_reviews.author: Onmymerryway

customer_reviews.title: No sticking, less oil and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: My cookie sheet pan came in and I wanted to see if I can bake the sweet potato fries and it apparently turned sooo crispy that they were better than the restaurant ones. My kids absolutely loved them. You can get the precut ones from Trader Joe’s in the frozen section and all I did was put it on the cookie sheet and baked them. I love my new copper utensils and it’s so easy to clean and nothing sticks to it. I clean them when they are completely cooled down.
customer_reviews.author: Nims

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Cooking - Returned
customer_reviews.text: We returned this. We tried bacon, cookies and brussels sprouts on this cooking sheet. All of them cooked super weird. The bacon on the left was charred while the piece on the right was raw. The cookies did SO weird. I did a big batch on multiple cookie sheets and only the ones on this sheet spread out way further and got super thin and half of them burned. The brussels sprouts, though, didn’t cook as much as normal using a standard recipe of mine. Odd. So with 0 out of 3 trials ending well, we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LarrHurst

customer_reviews.title: Best Baking Set Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many fancy bakeware sets. This by far is the best I've ever used. I've made so much with these & true to advertising, nothing stuck. Everything was easily cleaned. Just one note, the sheet pan is barely small enough to fit in an apartment size oven.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Corbin

customer_reviews.title: A little warping occurs
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very impressed with these sheets. They are very heavy and appear made. Figured there would be no way these things would warp in the oven. Cooking bacon at 350° you can see from the video they warp, but on a positive side due to the heavy build you can see the bacon cooked really even. Overall decent if you don’t mind a little warping.
customer_reviews.author: CRBock

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that nothing sticks to this sheet pan
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that nothing sticks to this sheet pan. However I did not like that it warped at 400F and tipped the filling out of my pumpkin pie! Also has cuts where I sliced Home made pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Fox

customer_reviews.title: Decent thickness for the metal and the non stick coating ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent thickness for the metal and the non stick coating works perfectly. For the first use we baked a salmon in the pan and the skin did not stick at all. The pan cleaned within seconds. Have used is a few times now and have not had a single problem with it. I was worried that the metal would be thin and warp but that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Lower time, lower the temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Use a much lower temperature and time .They cook evenly as long as you use both time and temp much lower. Cookies at about 20 degrees lower time at least 10 minutes faster cooking. Things can burn if you set a standard timer at cookie package directions. They are great once you get the time and temperature set in your head. Definitely energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looked great but first time I used it a piece of finish came off. Doubt it lasts very long. Cleaned up nice. I used soft tools. Cost as much to return as was to buy so no point.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking. Much heavier than a regular cookie sheet ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these. Very nice looking. Much heavier than a regular cookie sheet and holds the heat a lot longer (be aware of this when you pull it out of the oven - it won't cool very quickly. The non-stick surface is very effective. I cooked cinnamon rolls on it and had to hold them down to put the icing on them because they wouldn't grip the pan. One quirky thing - both good and bad - is that they're bigger than regular cookie sheets. Had to turn it sideways to get it into the oven.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tom Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these initially to make egg muffins without using a non-stick spray or butter. I over filled the cups with eggs and diced veggies and when it was time to remove them I was concerned they may all be stuck. To my surprise, they came out with no problem! I haven’t used them for real cupcakes yet since I’m trying to diet but I’m sure they would slide right out as well. Also, since there was no spray or butter added to my eggs, there was no oily residue on the muffins :)
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gotham Steel has THE BEST copper pans on the market!!! All other's have failed my kitchen!!! 2 years now on same Gotham Steele frying pan, still not scratched, still doesn't stick to pan and easy clean!!! Three other brands have FAILED my kitchen within 7 month's! be advised
customer_reviews.author: Brenda l. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. I had a very tough, baked-on mess that was going to be very difficult to scour off. So I just filled it with water and let it soak over night. The next morning all the baked-on food just rinsed right off and the cookie sheet didn’t rust from the overnight soak.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Cleans so easy and works super!  Now if I could just get cooking lessons!  :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Nothing sticks to it and it washes super super easy! Way less effort on my part than any other bakewear I have ever used! I have the pots and pans and am adding to my collection with the cookie sheets and pizza pans! Cant beat the price and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie-- a blind shopper

customer_reviews.title: Another great pan from Gotham!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Great for baking! Got a pretty deep scratch on the bottom from the oven rack during my first use, but it doesn't affect the baking of the food.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parks

customer_reviews.title: It warps when heated!!
customer_reviews.text: The pan is heavy, it pops and makes a loud sound when heated in the oven. It does not stay flat, it warps on one side after heating. Not worth returning. It is easy to clean. I will keep only for cookies and rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Genius Wireless Mouse Pen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Copper
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE the Copper Cookie Sheets. I only have one but will soon remedy that. No need for parchment paper or spray. Things just slide right off. You don't have to heat your oven quite as hot as the copper holds in the heat. Easy clean up which is also a 5 star in my book. I'm pretty much sold on any of the copper coated kitchen items. They all clean up so easily and have lasted much longer than my normal pans.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smothers

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. Use less packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Says it's dishwasher safe but some rusty water came out when I put it in the dishwasher. Still good and works though. I didn't like how excessive the packaging was. Each piece had a paper packaging describing what it was (they all said the same thing) and plastic to prevent scratching. Glad it wasnt scratched but really? All that went to a landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Lechon

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-Stick Muffin Pan
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy gauge metal and the coating is awesome. Have made everything from regular blueberry muffins to mini egg frittatas, and nothing sticks. No warping and very easy clean-up; no carbonized residue in the crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Muffins fall right out no need for papers easy clean up love this pan
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be non-stick, but that is a lie. Hand washed, first use, muffins stuck. Had to use a knife to scrape the sides to get then out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: BLING IN THE KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these jelly roll pans beautiful they've performed like the great kitchen gear I had hoped for. Delicious meals every time no matter whether roasted asparagus or stuff asparagus. Bon appetit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Grose

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my copper pans!!! 1st thing I made on them was jalapeno poppers and I don't know about anybody else but I always have trouble with them sticking in my pans but with these they slid off with a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Audrianna

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks to these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst non stick pans I have ever used. I even tried Pam spray and still, everything stuck like glue.. these are awful.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. As advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. As advertised, nonstick...no oil/grease/butter needed. Casserole did not burn in the oven. Easily cleanup. Hopefully the pan lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Need to find nonscratch utensils
customer_reviews.text: I discovered that the TV ad saying you could use your regular kitchen utensils was not correct. While using regular utensils, I discovered that the pan now has scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta P.

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: This pan is so easy to clean. Food slides right off. It also has a little weight to it which is nice. I have only had it a few months. So far so good and no warping.
customer_reviews.author: The shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan!
customer_reviews.text: This pan heats quickly, doesn't scorch, cooks food without burning and cleans up easily. It did buckle once at a high temperature but didn't effect food being cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Elin Frye

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on these.  Noting sticks but cookies are burnt on bottom and raw inside.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for baking cookies. I have tried 2 different ovens, multiple different temps and time variations and results are always the same. The bottom and sides of cookies are burnt and the inside raw. I regret not trying these pans sooner as they would have been returned, waste of money on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Muffin Pans
customer_reviews.text: We love this product and have already used the muffin pans 4 or 5 times. No sticking whatsoever! So easy to clean too. We have several of these Gotham steel products that we have used for a couple years now. We have had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: We have pretty much everything from this company. Not sure why we waited so long to get this product but it’s awesome! Makes clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This muffin pan is excellent. I bought one to give my daughter and ...
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is excellent. I bought one to give my daughter and we used it twice and found it met every promise and more. The best part is not the easy clean up, although it IS easy. The best thing about this muffin pan is the crispy sides and bottom that it gives the muffins, even low fat muffins. We are very happy with this purchase and I will be buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: In Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised! I thought I had purchased this before, but it wasn’t the same one. Beautiful, but it burned food both times we used it. Threw is in garbage.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stay Non Stick
customer_reviews.text: I have the 15 piece set, plus the cookie sheet. Everything was fine for a few months, now I am on 6 months, doing the same things I always have and everything is sticking and hard to get off without scraping (which will take off the coating so you can't win). I really liked them and this is unfortunate!!!
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: You want non-stick? This is it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the copper finish so much I converted all my pots & pans over to it. If you want reliable non-stick then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: best non-stick cookware ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't even need a spatula to pick up biscuits, this thing is awesome. And I can toss it in the dishwasher. Amazing! Hubby and I are both in love with Gotham Steel cookware, so glad they are coming out with more items!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal K. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great pan! Nothing I've made has stuck to it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan! Nothing I've made has stuck to it (and that's without butter, oil, or spray).
customer_reviews.author: Beegy

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really enjoying it. And I love that it's different color thank others. For a kosher kitchen it's a must.
customer_reviews.author: Elina H.

customer_reviews.title: No what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Baked meatballs on this item and the bottom was burned? Thought it would not burn. But the clean up was great.
customer_reviews.author: CHK

customer_reviews.title: Best nonstick cookie sheets available.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for son's girlfriend, now fiancé. She really likes the copper nonstick surfaces and has other copper nonstick pots and pans. I get to eat the cookies she bakes. They are all delicious but I tell her I need more samples to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Kopf

customer_reviews.title: No better pan
customer_reviews.text: You would think that they would be a little resistant to scratching but after one use there were small sratches on the inside. For as much as I paid for them, I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Steel ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: No sticking, no scratching the burned stuff out, no more biscuits falling apart because they’re stuck. If it’s crusty just soak it a couple minutes in Dawn and wipes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as discribed!! No Copper
customer_reviews.text: I use my Gotham Steel tray in the oven and they WARP UP EVERYTIME, I NEVER seen any other ones do that. They WARP up and then after setting outside the oven for awhile, they,LL return to flat. WEARD! There NOT COPPER!! Magnet sticks to them, so there not copper as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that you shouldn't use metal
customer_reviews.text: In the product description it say these can have metal used on them and they won't scratch. Humm not the case in this review. I haven't used metal up till a few days ago; because I know that you not supposed to. I used my knife to slice a cookie pie I made, and it left a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Genepher P.

customer_reviews.title: Great baking sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I made perfect cookies on these. Cleaning was a breeze. I will order again l.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy-weight pan, that does not warp under high temps. All items have slipped right out, and clean-up a breeze. Of course, time will tell how the finish holds up.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeinSC

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Steel
customer_reviews.text: Gotham Steel is the best cookware out there. It's the only cookware I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Cupcake non stick miracle!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, no spray, no cupcake papers! Totally non stick awesome!!! It arrived on time and is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheese chips
customer_reviews.text: Love that I dont have to spray or line the pan. Nothing ever gets stuck. Easy to clean off and dries fast
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Copper Baking Pan and Cookie Sheet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous kitchen addition. Can't wait to use these. Arrived in perfect condition and quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frittata bites
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many copper and nonstick muffin pans, and Gotham is by far, the absolute best when it comes to nonstick bakeware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Great baking pan. I’ve bought the entire collection and very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Redman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, food gets cooked evenly and has a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Embossed Logo
customer_reviews.text: First one was fine. Ordered a second cookie sheet which came with a raised embossed logo in the middle of it? Food will get stuck, spatula will get damaged, and the finish scraped off. I can’t imagine who thought this was a good idea. This is not in the description or photos, or on the first one I ordered. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: S. ms

customer_reviews.title: Didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I can always count on this brand for non-stick, easy clean, good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: sjsherman921

customer_reviews.title: very up to date, work well
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is heavy but that only shows the quality. Nothing sticks and it conducts heat evenly with no warping.
customer_reviews.author: R. SELIG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. Love them and the ease of cleaning them
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans easily. So far nothing sticks to it even without muffin cups
customer_reviews.author: Cly

customer_reviews.title: Best Loaf Pan I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I love the non-stick coating of this pan. My loaves of bread literally just fall out when the bread is done. Cleanup is super easy. And I love the fact that the coating is safe to 500F - no chemicals to contaminate my bread.
customer_reviews.author: The_Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love "copper" no stick. only type of pans I'll get now. This bundle has most of what I need and they do clean easy and cook food well.
customer_reviews.author: Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade to our baking sheets!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our Teflon pans to safeguard our two birds. I’m so happy with the performance. Even baking, and food slides right off of it. I’ll be purchasing more Gotham Steel bakeware!
customer_reviews.author: Skyhag

customer_reviews.title: Well ,ade
customer_reviews.text: The pan is made from sturdy steel and properly coated with non-stick material. Well made and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lance C. Barland

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: It ok, if you only want to heat things and not cook them.
customer_reviews.author: Gilda

customer_reviews.title: Worst pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst pan ever, maybe it’s not designed to go to 450. But I did and since then everything sticks
customer_reviews.author: ron scales

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with purchase
customer_reviews.text: When bought new, these are the best loaf pans ever. Even sticky banana bread pops out with extreme ease. Barely any clean up after use and my bread bakes more evenly in these pans. So the bread is better. Delighted with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Cookie Sheet
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes it. That's all I am concerned about...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Z.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of cheap pans, am glad I moved up to this product!
customer_reviews.author: No FedEX Shipping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, non stick and easy to clean. I love Gotham steel cookware.
customer_reviews.author: vee

customer_reviews.title: Best cookie sheet ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this-easy cleaning, size of baking area, etc.!
customer_reviews.author: gramo

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Steel Ti-Cerama Nonstick Muffin Pan in...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to extract muffins, cornbread, etc. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Neely

customer_reviews.title: Great for a while
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a few months then start to lose quite a bit of their non-stick quality.
customer_reviews.author: scottmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Gotham Steel cookware,  good quality product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to cook with, cleaning after use is a breeze. No worries about having to soak or scrape after using it, just wipe with a damp towel or cloth and put away until next use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this Loaf Pan
customer_reviews.text: Never sticks, My Low Carb Zucchini Chocolate Chip Bread is Always Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Requires no oil
customer_reviews.text: I bake everything on this; cookies, tater tots, fish, anything that goes in the oven. No oil needed to prevent sticking. Cleans up with a fast wipe and rinse. Love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Merkle

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. It warped in my oven the first time I used it. Not only that...there was an awful smell that came out of the pan. I really think this is a hoax and needs to be reported. DO NOT BUY this!! It came with arbitration paperwork which i found really suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Great pan. Haven't had anything stick to it so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. Haven't had anything stick to it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beegy

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan with ceramic coating actually does what it says. Cleanup is a breeze. Replacing all my pans with Gotham Steel Copper with ceramic coating.
customer_reviews.author: Dadoma

customer_reviews.title: I love copper pans and I am so glad that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love copper pans and I am so glad that I now have a copper cookie sheet. These pans do not stick, and are easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: ToriaRose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great and removed the worry of using aluminum bakeware.
customer_reviews.author: Elena R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 star review referral and "Do Not Buy" recommendation of Gotham Steel TIM-Cerama Muffin Pan.
customer_reviews.text: Does not meet expectations, as on 1st bake cornbread muffins stuck to sides and bottom of pan and caused ugly tear scars on muffins while removing from pan. That wasn't supposed to happen! Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: John P. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing easy to use cleans up like you ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing easy to use cleans up like you wouldn't believe I've made meatloaf in it I've made banana bread in it cleans beautifully it's great
customer_reviews.author: Glenn McClure

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about these pans. Food slides right off
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Flavor rating is wierd. There is no flavor. Pan works as it should and muffins do not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if its  Gotham Steel.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing on this pan that says its Gotham Steel, the pan I got was half colored in copper and the grey base color.
customer_reviews.author: James Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan
customer_reviews.text: Made my caramel coconut brownies nothing added to the pan, oil, butter or spray, and the brownies came right out. Turned it over and out it came, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TW Shep

customer_reviews.title: Love this round pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this round pan! But, I have not yet tried the other shapes/sizes I ordered so will have to rate those later.
customer_reviews.author: Beegy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sticks to this sheet
customer_reviews.text: Love this Gotham Steel cookie sheet. It works just as advertised. Nothing sticks to it. I tossed my old cookie sheets and bought 2 more of these babies! Kept one and gave the other as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: jpt816

customer_reviews.title: They are great! I love them
customer_reviews.text: Just started using these. They are great! I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good. So far used it for bacon and again ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems good. So far used it for bacon and again for breaded chicken and potatoes. Both came off easily and clean up was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing baking set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing baking set. Never have to grease my pans. My mom used one for cornbread, and I have never seen her more happy about cooking.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: I love all my gotham steel products
customer_reviews.text: I love all my gotham steel products. As seen on TV can sometimes be garbage, but I'm very happy with all my gotham steel items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gotham Steel 1389 Nonstick Copper Cookie Sheet and Jelly Roll Baking Pan 12" x 17" – 1 PACK, Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cookie SheetGotham Steel cookies tray perfects for chocolate chip, lemon shortbread and oatmeal raisin cookies. Nonstick inside and out delivers great food release and makes cleanup quick, even after baking a gooey batch of caramel fudge cookies. Oven safe to 500 Degree, this nonstick cookie pan makes an ideal addition to the cake, muffin and specialty baking pans.
feature_bullets: The perfect cookie sheet for all your baking needs
No oil or butter ever needed - true non-stick surface
Aluminum with Titanium and Ceramic finish resists scratches - even metal utensils
Oven Safe up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit
Clean up made easy - simply wipe with cloth or throw it in the dishwasher
